flavorText:
"The land has been gracious enough to let you tread upon her for years. That privilege is about to end."
—Liefellen, Quirion exarch

foreignData.name: Quiriondruide
foreignData.text: {G}, {T}: Ein Land Deiner Wahl wird permanent zu einer 2/2 grünen Kreatur. Dieses Land zählt weiterhin als Land.

foreignData.name: クウィリーオン・ドルイド

name: Quirion Druid
originalText:
o
G, oc
T: Target land becomes a 2/2 green creature permanently. That land still counts as a land.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: {G}, {T}: Target land becomes a 2/2 green creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
